metadata.title: CVE-2022-3448 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Permissions API in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.119allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIgestures to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
